data.title: Assessment endpoints working
data.description:
Fixed the test components and make them work properly:
For the GET endpoint, use just /api/assessment/:id
For the PUT and DELETE endpoints, use /api/assessment/:userId/:id

When testing:
For the userId, use the UUID from your login response (like 67b29316-4dc6-4766-8add-7939d182adb5)
For the id, use the assessment ID (like assessment-1743614305450)
